short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alert you when edline is going to log you out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In its current state, Edline will automatically log you out after 20 minutes of inactivity. This extension allows you to choose options of early warning and prevention against log out. 

********
NOW SUPPORTS MULTIPLE TABS
********

Message from sgtkode:
    I made this extension primarily because I was just fed up with the annoying idle log out system on Edline. This extension will send you notifications before you are going to be logged out, or automatically refresh the site for you. However, it's a quick fix and might have a few bugs. If you have any problems or suggestions, please send feedback and I'll get back to you as quick as possible

Thanks for supporting,
Sean
